summary: For Best results use with your left hand.
descriptionHtml:
Slightly buggy if you wield it in your right hand you cast it as a spell....don\'t know how to fix it...don\'t particularly want to.


Now on to the discription;

The power to command Lightning is easier for all with The Staff Of The Thunder Gods, The enchantment on the staff allows all of you puny mortals the power of the Lightning Storm regardless of your experience with the magics.
The Staff has an infinite charge for those with hilarious intents.
Yes its a cheat and no i wont make a non-cheat version... Games are meant to fave fun with not to take seriously... ok enough philosophy...have fun, or not...whatever

It\'s a pretty simple mod and you can imagine what it looks like with no new textures or meshes so i\'m not gonna upload pictures, but feel free to if you wish. It matters not to I.

Also it is in Breezehome In the master bedroom
author: Lelouch2021
